挫.definition: obstructed; to fail; to oppress; to repress; to lower the tone; to bend back; to dampen

挫折.definition: setback; reverse; check; defeat; frustration; disappointment; to frustrate; to discourage; to set sb back; to blunt; to subdue

挫敗.definition: to thwart; to foil (sb's plans); a setback; a failure; a defeat
